title: League of legends the only game crashing.
body: I get into a game first off. Once I get into the game couple of minutes the game freezes up the whole god damn pc. I do not have a bad pc. It run almost all the new games like wildlands. Ever since I got this patch update and couple of day after it, its acting up.

replies.body:
Since your entire pc is locking up and not just league, it sounds to me like there might be some odd hardware issue going on. There's a good number of issues that could be causing this, so I'd like to have you get some one on one help. 

Reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech guys will be able to go much more in depth.
League of legends is the only game crashing. No other game is crashing....
You're not alone! I am praying this is the patch's fault because I miss league.

mine keeps having the exact same issue. im literally going to quit league after 5 years because of this patch. My fps and ping will be perfect but it just randomly says "attempting to reconnect" and i cant move but everything around me moves normally. I literally sit there and watch my laner kill me. i can level up abilities, open menus and everything EXCEPT for moving and casting abilities and sums.
